question:
Which of the following are the techniques for detection of cancer of internal organs?
(a) Radiography, MRI
(b) MRI, computed tomography
(c) Widal test, radiography
(d) MRI, widal test
explanation: Radiography (X-rays), CT (Computed Tomography), and MRI are used to detect cancers of internal organs. Widal test is for Typhoid. Thus, sets (a) and (b) contain the correct techniques.
